data.title: Looney Tunes on DVD, Blu-ray, and iTunes: The Full (?) List
data.meta_description: Thought this thread would prove useful to you Looney Tunes fans.  With roughly 1,000 shorts, you might wonder what's available on DVD, Blu-ray, and iTunes...
data.text:
Thought this thread would prove useful to you Looney Tunes fans. With roughly 1,000 shorts, you might wonder what's available on DVD, Blu-ray, and iTunes. Wonder no more; here is an up-to-date list. Two things to note:

1) The list doesn't include shorts on VHS or Laserdisc. For a good resource on that, check out this link.

2) This thread is only for Region 1. I'm aware there are certain shorts only available on DVDs in other regions, but this isn't the thread for that.

Abbreviations:

LLLBBM= The Looney Looney Looney Bugs Bunny Movie

LTCS= Looney Tunes Center Stage

LTGC= Looney Tunes Golden Collection

LTPC= Looney Tunes Platinum Collection

LTSC= Looney Tunes Spotlight Collection

LTSS= Looney Tunes Super-Stars

SHORTS ON DVD, BD, or iTunes:

8 Ball Bunny: 50 Cartoon Collection, Bugs Bunny Vol. 2 (iTunes), Essential Bugs Bunny, LTGC 4, LTPC 1, LTSC 4, Treasure of the Sierra Madre

14 Carrot Rabbit: Bugs Bunny Vol. 3 (iTunes), LTGC 5, LTSC 5
